text.p: These are the leading stories in Zimbabwe's state-owned Herald newspaper on Wednesday.
Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Zimbabwean textile giant Cone Textiles, which was closed in 1994 because of financial woes, is back in operation.
- Air Zimbabwe, wrangling with British Airways over flights between the two countries, might soon be allowed to resume its Wednesday night flight to London.
- African elephant range countries have recommended the use of intelligence and undercover operations to control illegal trafficking of ivory.
